subject: STOCK OF PEDALS IN BRAZIL
description_text:
HELLO, HOW ARE YOU?

I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW IF YOU HAVE STOCK IN BRAZIL TO PURCHASE YOUR PRODUCTS?

DO YOU HAVE ANY REPRESENTATIVE IN BRAZIL?

WOULD IT BE POSSIBLE TO BUY YOUR PRODUCTS THROUGH ALIEXPRESS?
CUSTOMS TAX POLICY WORKS WELL ON ALIEXPRESS

THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR YOUR ATTENTION
RAFAEL CRUZ.

conversations.body_text: Hi Rafael Cruz,  You can purchase our products on AliExpress or the official SIMSONN website. Currently, we don't have a distributor in Brazil, so please note that import duties may apply.

Hello

Are you interested in having a representative in Brazil?

Do the products on AliExpress not ship to Brazil?

[image: Captura de tela 2025-07-07 104812.png]





Em seg., 7 de jul. de 2025 às 00:57, service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> escreveu:

> Hi Rafael Cruz,
>
> You can purchase our products on *AliExpress* or the *official SIMSONN
> website*.
> Currently, we don't have a distributor in Brazil, so please note that
> import duties may apply.
>
>
> On Sat, 5 Jul at 12:02 PM , Rafael Cruz <r.silva.cruz2015@gmail.com>
> wrote:
> HELLO, HOW ARE YOU?
>
> I WOULD LIKE TO KNOW IF YOU HAVE STOCK IN BRAZIL TO PURCHASE YOUR PRODUCTS?
>
> DO YOU HAVE ANY REPRESENTATIVE IN BRAZIL?
>
> WOULD IT BE POSSIBLE TO BUY YOUR PRODUCTS THROUGH ALIEXPRESS?
> CUSTOMS TAX POLICY WORKS WELL ON ALIEXPRESS
>
> THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR YOUR ATTENTION
> RAFAEL CRUZ.
>
> 1244:4206036
>

Hi Rafael Cruz,    Of course we would like to have a Brazilian agent, but we have not been approached by the right one. Also, AliExpress did close the sale to Brazil for some specific reasons of our own.
